meanings.definition: A synthetic form of vitamin B12.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed cyanocobalamin to boost my vitamin levels.
meanings.sent2: Many people take cyanocobalamin supplements to stay healthy.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally spilled cyanocobalamin powder all over the kitchen counter!
meanings.sent4: Her energy levels skyrocketed after starting a regimen of cyanocobalamin.
meanings.sent5: The bright blue color of cyanocobalamin tablets caught my eye at the pharmacy.

meanings.definition: A nutrient essential for red blood cell formation.
meanings.sent1: Eating foods rich in cyanocobalamin helps in making red blood cells.
meanings.sent2: Cyanocobalamin deficiency can lead to anemia.
meanings.sent3: The red blood cells threw a party to celebrate the arrival of cyanocobalamin!
meanings.sent4: Her bloodstream flowed smoothly thanks to the presence of cyanocobalamin.
meanings.sent5: The body craved cyanocobalamin to keep the blood healthy and vibrant.

meanings.definition: Used to treat vitamin B12 deficiency.
meanings.sent1: The doctor recommended cyanocobalamin injections for the deficiency.
meanings.sent2: Cyanocobalamin is a common remedy for vitamin B12 deficiency.
meanings.sent3: The vitamin deficiency ran away in fear as soon as cyanocobalamin entered the scene!
meanings.sent4: Her health improved drastically after starting the cyanocobalamin treatment.
meanings.sent5: The deficiency vanished like magic under the influence of cyanocobalamin.
